channel.title: Dave Sweeten's Podcast
channel.description: Radio shows, DJ mixes, and sonic sorcery from artist/producer/dj, Dave Sweeten and friends. Stay tuned for some of the world's freshest future bass! You Paypal donations help make this podcast possible. :-)
channel.itunes:subtitle: Beats and Bass!
channel.itunes:author: Dave Sweeten
channel.itunes:summary: Radio shows, DJ mixes, and sonic sorcery from artist/producer/dj, Dave Sweeten and friends. Stay tuned for some of the world's freshest future bass! You Paypal donations help make this podcast possible. :-)

item.title: Basstream Radio on Glitch.FM 105 - VA Mixed by Dave Sweeten
item.description: Basstream Radio on Glitch.FM 105 BREAKS - VA Mixed by Dave Sweeten - Aired 03-06-2012 Track list: 1. Basstream Intro 2. MF Silva - T.B.E. in the House Intro (Unreleased) 3. Layerz - Melting People 4. Si Begg - Are You a Big Boy DJ? (Heq Remix) 5. Mr. Bill - Wan 6. Buckfunk 3000 aka Si Begg - Turn the Volume Up (2004 Demo Version) - Sithop for Japan 7. G.T.M. - Bouncy 8. Period the End - Froo Ish'n (Substruk Records) 9. Nymate Association - Stratic (DST Remix) 10. Dewey dB - The Penguin 11. Bill Bless - Saturday Morning 12. Audiovoid - Being a Whore 13. Period the End - Not Named - Unreleased 14. Period the End - Into the Void (Substruk Records) 15. MF Silva - Cruising Altitude - Unreleased 16. The Breakbeat Elite - Circuit Theory - Unreleased
item.dc:creator: Dave Sweeten

item.title: Basstream Radio on Glitch.FM 097 - VA Mixed by Dave Sweeten - Aired 01-10-2012
item.description: Basstream Radio on Glitch.FM 097 - VA Mixed by Dave Sweeten - Aired 01-10-2012 Please feel free to download and share. 1. Basstream Intro 2. Thriftworks - As the Crow Flies 3. Rena Jones - Helix (EVAC Remix) 4. Tipper - Adrift For Days 5. Bluetech - Unidentified Flying Octopus (Mr. Bill Remix) 6. Blatwax - Cellular 7. EVAC - Edit 8. Tipper - Lumpy Haggis 9. Spoonbill - Finger Food 10. Audiovoid - Like Fire 11. Desiseq - Dr Bumfinkle 12. NovaTRON - Fugue Regolare (Heavenly Father Remix) 13. Kusillo - Digital Anima 14. Nagual Sound Experiment - Anti Spiral 15. Trimaxis - Alchemy 16. Mr. Bill vs Tha Fruitbat - Pteroplex 17. Period The End - Spirit Molecule 18. Audiovoid - Gape Ride

item.title: Basstream Radio on Glitch.FM 085 - VA mixed by Dave Sweeten - Aired 10.18.2011
item.description: My Basstream Radio set recorded live 10.18.11 on Glitch.FM . Please feel free to download and share!
